metadata.title: CVE-2020-19190 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in _nc_find_entry in tinfo/comp_hash.c:70 inncurses 6.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service viacrafted command.

criterions.comment: ncurses: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
